58043.「クスクス。もう 終わりなの？\n ねえ ザンクローネ<heart>:
Oh, dear... Is it over already?
Hmm, Zanky-poo? <heart>.

58044.「キャハ<heart> きっと助けにくると思ってたわ！\n でも ざんね～ん！\:
Aha... I just knew you would come and try to
stop me. But too bad for you... you aren't
going anywhere inside that circle.

58045.「絶体絶命ね ザンクローネッ。\n そんな弱さで 英雄なんて笑っちゃう。:
Just give it up, Zanky-poo.
How pathetic that a hero could be so weak...

58046.「魔女グレイツェル……。\n 俺の命は お前にくれてやったっていい。: Gretzel... I'm offering you my life.

58047.「だから これ以上 メルサンディの村人を\n 苦しめるのは やめてくれ。:
So please, just stop torturing the villagers!
It's too much!

58049.「メルサンディ村 メルサンディ村って…… \n あなたは 自分の身なんてかえりみ:
Melsandy Village this, Melsandy Village
that... You're worrying too much about them
when you should be worrying about yourself.

58050.「じゃあ どうして……あの時\n 私のことを 救ってくれなかったの？: Then why... why didn't you save me back then?

58052.「あなたの英雄ごっこを 終わりにしてあげる。: It's time to put an end to your heroics.

58054.「さあ 英雄さん<heart>\n 大好きな村人に その身を斬り刻まれて\n 永:
Well, Mr. Hero? <heart> I hope you'll enjoy
your most cherished villager cutting you
into pieces.

58056.「ごめんな……救ってやれなくて。: I'm sorry... I couldn't save you.

58057.「キャハハハハッ！\n 愛する村人に 殺されるなんて ヒサ～ン<heart>\n:
Ahahaha! How tragic, to be killed by one of
your beloved villagers! <heart> There's no
hope for you where you're going!

58059.「どんな時も……希望は 消えない。: Hope will never die... no matter what...

58060.「そんな……私の魔法に 逆らうなんて！？: Impossible! You dare defy my magic?!

58061.「……お前の声が かれない限り \n 救いは 必ず訪れる……そうだったな。:
As long as I can hear your voices, salvation
will always be there... Always.

58063.「今の俺には これが精一杯だ……。\n 魔女を倒してくれ……<cs_pchero:
This is all I can do for now...
Take down that hag, <cs_pchero>.

58064.「……いいわ。\n 私の手で 英雄の物語に幕を引きましょう。:
That's fine. It's about time the curtains
closed on this heroic tale anyway.

58065.「奇跡なんてない 血も涙も枯れはてた\n 本当のフィナーレを 見せてあげるッ！:
No more miracles. No more blood. No more
tears. I'll show you what a true finale is!

58066.「私の手で 英雄の物語に幕を引きましょう。:
It's about time the curtains closed on this
heroic tale anyway.

58067.「奇跡なんてない 血も涙も枯れはてた\n 本当のフィナーレを 見せてあげるッ！:
No more miracles. No more blood. No more
tears. I'll show you what a true finale is!

58069.「すまねえ ラスカ。 \n お前に 助けられるなんてな。:
I'm sorry, Raska. I can't believe I let you
save me.

58070.「魔女よ……。なぜ 俺を恨み\n 村に 破壊と混乱をもたらした？:
Hey, witch... Why do you hate me, and continue
to bring chaos to the village?

58073.「……気づいてたのね。\n いいわ。最後に 昔話をしましょうか。:
So, you noticed... Fine. I'll humor you with
an old story.

58074.「あれは 遠い昔……\n メルサンディ村が 今より ずっと貧しくて\n 魔物の脅:
It was a long time ago... when Melsandy
Village was much poorer than it is now and
constantly threatened by monsters...

58075.「メルサンディ村に 村人たちから\n 魔女の娘と呼ばれて しいたげられていた\n:
In Melsandy Village, there was a girl whom
the villagers called the witch's
daughter, and they tormented her.

58076.「それが 私。\n 亡くなった祖母が 不思議な術を\n 使える人だったおかげでね:
That girl was me. All thanks to my late
grandmother who could use a mysterious
magic.

58077.「村に居場所がなかった私は 村が豊かになれば\n しいたげられることもなくなると:
I had no place there, so I prayed to the spirit of the shrine... I wished the village would become prosperous, and in doing so
the torment would stop.

58078.「そんなとき 英雄ザンクローネが現れた。\n あなたは 村を襲いにくる魔物を や:
Then, Zankrone the hero appeared. You defeated
the monsters that attacked the village,
and everyone in the village adored you.

58079.「村人は 誰も気づいていなかったけど\n 私は すぐわかったわ。:
None of the villagers had noticed, but I
noticed right away.

58080.「あなたが ほこらの精霊さまだって。: That you were the spirit inside the rock...

58081.「だけど……魔物の襲撃は やまなかった。 \n そして 村に 嫌なウワサが立ちは:
However... the monsters didn't stop their
attacks. And rumors began to spread.

58082.「魔女が 魔物を呼んでるんじゃないか\n ……ってね。: "I think the monsters are the witch's doing."

58083.「ウワサは ジワジワと 村中に広がっていき\n やがて 誰もが 信じるようになっ:
Word slowly spread through the village, and
soon enough, everyone believed it.

58084.「私は あなたと 遠くへ逃げることを \n 望んだけれど それは かなわなかった:
I had hoped to run away with you, but it was
just not meant to be...

58085.「英雄のあなたが 知らないところで \n 私は 村人たちに 捕らえられて\n 激:
Unbeknownst to you, hero, they captured me
and beat me senseless.

58086.「やっとの思いで 逃げ出して \n 走って走って……だけど 追いつめられて\n:
I finally escaped... I ran and I ran... but
they eventually caught up to me, and I ended
up falling into a deep valley.

58087.「身も心も キズだらけの女の子は\n 暗い死の淵で 英雄を恨んで 村を呪って……:
A girl with wounds all over her body and soul, on the verge of death, with a hatred of the hero, and cursing that village...
That's when she truly became a witch.

58088.「めでたし めでたし<heart>: And she lived happily ever after.

58089.「それで メルサンディ村を\n 襲ったというのか？: So that's why you attacked the village?

58091.「救えねえな。\n いくら 昔のメルサンディ村を恨んでいようが\n 今の村のヤツ:
There's no excuse. The people in the village
now have nothing to do with the villagers
that you resented from back then.

58092.「いかなる 理由があろうと\n お前のしたことは 許されねえ。:
No matter what the reason is, what you did is
unforgivable.

58094.「本当に その人を斬ってもいいのか……？: Are you really sure you want to do that...?

58095.「……ラスカ。\n 英雄に必要なものは なんだと思う？:
What do you think it takes to be a hero,
Raska?

58097.「そうだ。よく覚えてんじゃねえか。: That's right. You did good to remember that.

58098.「メルサンディの すべての悲劇は\n 俺の罪から 生まれた。:
All of Melsandy's tragedies were all because
of my wrongdoings.

58099.「それでも 俺は ふてぶてしく\n すべてを 救ってやる。:
Even still... I have the guts to save
everything and everyone.

58102.「およしなさい ザンクローネ！！ \n そんな ケガレを取り込んだら\n 精霊の:
Stop it, Zankrone! If you take on too much of
a burden, you'll disappear!

58103.「ずっと 悔いてたんだ。\n お前を 救えなかったこと……。:
I've always regretted... that I couldn't save
you...

58104.「死なせてなんか やらねえよ。\n 生きて あがいて 罪をつぐないな。:
I'm not gonna let you die. Live through life's
struggles... and redeem yourself.

58107.「ラスカ。お前に 頼みがある。: Raska. I have a favor to ask you.

58108.「俺は もう メルサンディ村を守れない。\n 俺に代わって 村を守ってくれ。:
I can no longer protect Melsandy Village. So,
you gotta do it for me.

58109.「……わかった。オレに まかせて。: Yeah... You can leave it to me.

58110.「<cs_pchero>。お前には\n 感謝しても しきれねえな。:
And of course, <cs_pchero>.
You've done so much for me.
Thank you.

58111.「恩に着るぜ 相棒。\n お前に会えて よかった。:
I owe you big time, partner.
I really am glad I met you.

58112.「どんな時も 希望は捨てんな。 \n メルサンディ村…は 俺と…ともに……:
Never give up hope. Melsandy Village...
...is safe with me...

58114.「あんたは これから\n きっと 死ぬよりも 苦しんで\n 生きてかなきゃならな:
You're really gonna live with a lot of pain,
aren't you?

58115.「村の皆に 責められて\n 殴られたって 仕方ない。:
And the villagers treating you badly
definitely doesn't help.

58116.「それでも くじけず 生きていこう。\n オレが あんたを守るよ。\n それが:
But don't let that stop you from living your
life. I'll protect you, because that's what
Zankrone wanted.

58118.「おう まかせとけ！！\n あんたの声が かれない限り \n 救いは 必ず訪れる:
Yeah, leave it to me! As long as I can hear
your voice, salvation will always come!

58119.「さあ メルサンディ村に 帰ろうぜ！: Come on, let's go back to the village!

58120.「<pc>さん……！\n お待ちしていました。:
Oh, <pc>!
I've been waiting for you.

58121.「『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』の結末が\n ついに 書き上がったんです。:
"The Story of Little Hero
Zankrone" is finally finished.

58122.「約束通り 最初の読者さんになってください。: As promised, you'll be the first to read it.

58123.<center>……こうして ザンクローネは\nその身に すべての恨みを 引き受:
And so, Zankrone embraced all of the burden in
his body and vanished.

58124.<center>人間に戻ったクレルは メルサンディ村で\n村人のためにはたらき:
Krell, who had returned to being human once more, continued to work for the villagers and offered her blessings.
Her sincerity eventually opened the hearts of the villagers.

58125.<center>メルサンディ村の英雄は もういません。\nしかし その心は\n永:
The hero of Melsandy was no more... but his
heart lived on in this village forever.

58127.「おじいさまの ノートを見たら\n 胸のつかえが ウソみたいになくなって\n ス:
When I looked at my grandfather's notebook,
the pain in my chest disappeared, and my
hands could glide across the paper.

58128.「でも まだ 自信が持てないんです……。\n こういう結末で よかったのかしら？:
But I still don't feel confident... was that
really the right way to end it?

58129.アイリに パンパニーニの伝言を\n伝えますか？<yesno><close>:
Give Aili the message from Pampanini?
<yesno><close>

58130.「あの……<pc>さん\n 無言になられると 不安になってしまいます。:
Um...<pc>....
I get anxious when you go quiet like that.

58131.アイリに パンパニーニの伝言を\n伝えますか？<yesno><close>:
Give Aili the message from Pampanini?
<yesno><close>

58132.「えっ……？\n パンパニーニおじいさまが\n ありがとうと 言っていたんですか: What...? My grandpa said thank you?

58133.「<pc>さんが おっしゃるなら\n きっと そうなんですよね。:
If you say it happened, then... it must've
really happened.

58134.「これで よかったんですね\n おじいさま……。: You're happy now, aren't you grandpa...?

58135.「あなたのおかげで 夢が かないました。\n <pc>さんが いてくださらなかっ:
My dream couldn't have come true without
your help. Without you, the little hero's
story would never have been finished.

58136.「心から 感謝いたします。\n ありがとう……不思議な旅人さん！:
I thank you from the bottom of my heart.
Thank you, mysterious traveler!

93317.「これが メルサンディ村で \n ほんの１００年前に起こった お話のすべてよ。:
And that's the whole story of what happened
in Melsandy Village just 100 years ago.
